translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

In response to your letter of the 18th of the current month, in which you request 200 lances and a portion of cavalry cartridges, I must inform you that I have taken all the necessary measures so that within these eight days the lances you require will be prepared, and they will be immediately sent to the Justice of the Peace of São Gabriel, as well as the cartridges deemed necessary.

God keep Your Lordship  
Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.  
War Affairs Secretariat in Caçapava, December 22, 1839.  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre
